hotfix-crash.instruction: Fix AttributeError: 'Household' object has no attribute 'update_political_opinion' in core_agents.py or trace_leak.py
hotfix-crash.title: Hotfix: Household Impact

td-111-spec.instruction: Create a detailed technical specification for TD-111 (Reflux M2 Calculation) based on the plan in design/specs/D_TRACK_ALPHA_REMEDIATION.md. The goal is to implement 'get_m2_money_supply' in EconomicIndicatorTracker and ensure it excludes 'reflux_system.balance' while maintaining zero-sum integrity in WorldState. Output the spec to design/specs/TD-111_REFLUX_M2_SPEC.md.

mission-td-111.instruction: Implement get_m2_money_supply in tracker as per spec. Correct consumers.
mission-td-111.title: Fix: M2 Money Supply Measurement

mission-wo-053.instruction: Integrate TechnologyManager with ProductionDepartment as per spec.
mission-wo-053.title: Feature: Industrial Revolution P23
